posts.title: Overview of attention mechanism
posts.text: General speaking, the output of all the operations we have used such as fully connected layers, convolutions or poolings is mainly driven by its local input value. The arising of attention mechanism brings two main changes: depending on the feature themselves, not on their positions, relaxing locality constraints. These two changes are ascribed to the dynamic modulation of the weighting of different parts of a signal which permits the presentation and allocation of information channels to be dependent on the activations themselves. At the beginning, this mechanism was developed to entitle deep-learning models with memory-like function, to capture long-term/range dependencies for sequence-to-sequence translation. The translation task can be thought of as $$y_t=f(x_t)$$

posts.title: Python关键字yield
posts.text: 首先需要了解什么是可迭代量（iterables）。比如创建了一个list，你可以逐一读取其中的每一个元素。 123mylist = [x*x for x in range(3)]for i in mylist: print(i) 在Python中可以进行 1for ... in ... 操作的还有strings, files等可迭代量。这些可迭代量非常便于读取，但是所有的值都存储在其中，有些时候这并不是我们想要的。 生成器（generators）是一种仅可以被迭代一次但是不需要存储在内存中的可迭代量。 123mygenerator = (x*x for x in range(3))for i in mygenerator: print(i) 仅需要用()代替[]，但是你没办法再次遍历 12for i in mygenerator: .... 生成器只生成不储存。yield关键字很多地方跟return一样除了在返回生成器的函数中。 12345678def create_generator(): mylist = range(3) for i in mylist: yield i*imygenerator = createGenerator()print(mygenerator) # my generator is an objectfor i in mygenerator: print(i) 函数返回一串值而你只需要读一次。

posts.title: 闲暇阅读（一）
posts.text: 这是从个人因素来分析收入,很客观地讨论了三个主要因素:能力,努力,机遇. 当然这是一个侧面的角度. 我们都知道在劳动市场, 个人的工资由劳动供给和劳动需求决定的, 这篇推送不仔细探讨了.这个准确的概述能解释很多现象,后面再聊.今天就只分享(偷懒)这段话了,感觉对个人的指导意义很大. "为什么主要棒球联盟的运动员得到的收入高于次要棒球联盟的运动员？可以确定，高工资并不是补偿性工资差别。在主要棒球联盟里打球并不是一件不如在次要棒球联盟里打球愉快的工作；实际上，情况正好相反。主要棒球联盟并不要求读过许多年书或更有经验。在很大程度上，主要棒球联盟的运动员赚钱更多只是因为他们有更大的天赋能力。 对所有职业的工人，天赋能力都是重要的。由于先天遗传和后天培养，人们的体力与脑力都不一样。一些人强壮，另一些人瘦弱。一些人聪明，另一些人差一点。一些人在社会场合中是外向的，另一些人是内向的。这些与其他个人特征决定了工人的生产率，因此在决定他们赚得的收入中起着作用。 与能力密切相关的是努力。一些人工作勤奋，另一些人懒散。看到那些工作勤奋的人生产率更高和工资更高我们并不奇怪。在某种程度上，企业直接按人们生产多少支付报酬。例如，销售人员通常是按他们完成的销售额百分比得到报酬。在另一些时候，勤奋工作却并不直接以高年薪和津贴的形式得到报酬。 在工资的决定中机遇也起着作用。如果一个人进商业学校学习如何修理真空管电视机，以后发现由于晶体管电器的发明这种技能已经过时了，与其他受过教育年限相似的人相比，他赚到的工资低。这个工人的低工资是由于机遇——一种经济学家承认，但并没有深人论述的现象。 能力、努力和机遇在决定工资的过程中有多重要呢？这是很难说的，因为能力、努力和机遇很难衡量。但间接的证据表明，它们是非常重要的。当劳动经济学家研究工资时，他们把工人的工资与这些可衡量的变量——正规教育年限、工作年限、年龄和工作特性——联系起来。虽然所有这些可衡量的变量正如理论所预期的那样影响工人的工资，但在我们的经济中它们只能解释工资变动的不足一半。由于无法解释的工资变动如此之大，所以一些被忽略的变量，包括能力、努力和机遇，应该起着一种重要作用。"[1] [1] （美）曼昆著，梁小民，梁砾译．经济学原理 （第7版）：北京大学出版社，2015年05月

posts.title: Git command
posts.text: How to initialize a repository Let’s say you have an existing project that you want to start tracking with git. Step 7 and 8 coulde be skipped, if you already add the public key. Go into the directory containing the project. exec “git init” create .gitignore file to exclude some unnecessary dirs and files exec “git add .” exec “git commit -m “first commit”” exec “git remote add origin git@github.com:xuyuluo/nlinv_prior.git” exec “ssh-keygen -t rsa -f ~/.ssh/id_rsa-foo -C email@xxx.com” exec “ssh -T git@github.com” git remote set-url origin git@github.com:xuyuluo/nlinv_prior.git" exec “git push -u origin master” Explanation to frequently used commands git remote add origin xxx.git: creates a new remote origin located at xxx.git git push origin master: push the commits in the local branch named ‘‘master’’ to the remote named ‘‘origin’’ git add files or dirs: add changes to next commit git commit: commit changes to the repository option -a of commit: too many changes, so commit all option --amend of commit: amend/modify last commit pull fetch

posts.title: handle tough strings with seq or awk
posts.text: Handle string stream Extract string from squared brackets Using awk echo “string1 [string2] string3 string4” | awk -F’[][]’ ‘{print $2}’ Using sed echo “string1 [string2] string3 string4” | sed ‘s/.[([^]])].*/\1/g’ s/ — this means it should perform a substitution .* — this means to match zero or more characters [ — this means match a literal [ character ( — this starts saving the pattern for later use [^]]* — this means match any character that is not a [ character the outer [ and ] signify that this is a 1. character class having the ^ character as the first character in the class means “not” ) — this closes the saving of the pattern match for later use ] — this means match a literal ] character .* — this means to match zero or more characters /\1 — this means to replace everything matched with the first saved pattern (the match between “(” and ")1. " )

posts.title: Look into discretized mixture of logistic distribution(DMOL)
posts.text: Discretized logistic mixture likelihood used as loss function for generative model was first proposed in PixelCNN++, and then was applied to predict discrete value in Wavenet. Definition of log sum exp (LSE)$$\vec{\boldsymbol{x}}={x_1, …, x_n}$$$$\mathrm{LSE}({\vec{x}}) = \log{(e^{x_1}+ … + e^{x_n})}$$ Definition of softmax$$\mathrm{softmax}(\vec{x}) = \frac{e^{x_i}}{e^{x_1}+… +e^{x_n}}$$ discretized mixture of logistic distribution (DMOL)$$P(x|\pi, \mu, s)=\sum_i^K\pi_i[\sigma(\frac{x+0.5-\mu_i}{s_i})-\sigma(\frac{x-0.5-\mu_i}{s_i})]$$$$\log{P(x|\pi, \mu, s)} = \sum_i^k \log{\pi_i}+\sum_i^k\log{g(x, \mu_i, s_i)}$$$$\log{\mathrm{softmax(\vec{x})}} = \log{(e^{x_i})} - \log{(e^{x_1}+…+e^{x_n}})$$ inverse sampling technique
